BOMBE1.original: One of your crew has stolen the armored vehicle. Make your way to the ~Y~rendezvous point.~S~
BOMBE1.translated: 你的一个队员已经偷走了装甲车。前往 ~Y~会合点~S~。

BOMBE1.original: You each have some explosives. Head out to the ~Y~docks~S~ in Broker.
BOMBE1.translated: 你们每个人都有一些炸药。前往Broker区的 ~Y~码头~S~ 。

BOMBE1.original: The ship has been destroyed. The rival operation is no more.
BOMBE1.translated: 船只已经被摧毁。敌人的计划被彻底摧毁。

BOMBE1.original: The bombs have been placed. Everyone needs to disembark to trigger the explosion.
BOMBE1.translated: 炸弹已经被安置。所有人都需要下船来引爆炸药。

BOMBE1.original: One bomb is in place. Get the other to the second weak spot.
BOMBE1.translated: 一个炸弹已经就位。 把另一个炸弹安放在第二个点。
这个~B~载具~S~正在停下， 偷走它。

BOMBE1.original: One of you must drive the ~B~armored vehicle~S~ to the rendezvous point.
BOMBE1.translated: 你们中的一个必须驾驶 ~B~装甲车~S~ 前往汇合点。

BOMBE1.original: There are enemy snipers somewhere on the boat, someone should take up a sniping position and keep watch.
BOMBE1.translated: 敌人的狙击手正在船上某处，你们中的一个人要去占领狙击点并且持续监视

BOMBE1.original: Take the vehicle back to the ~Y~rendezvous point.~S~
The helicopter has been destroyed. Find alternative transport to get to the ~Y~docks.~S~
BOMBE1.translated: 直升机已经被摧毁。找到替代载具前往 ~Y~码头。~S~

BOMBE1.original: To reach one of the bomb sites you will need to access the cargo hold from the ship's galley.
BOMBE1.translated: 你需要从船上的陈列室进入货仓来到达一个炸弹安放点。

BOMBE1.original: Wait here for the rest of your crew to arrive.
BOMBE1.translated: 在这里等待你的队员到达。

BOMBE1.original: Find the convoy. Steal the ~B~armored vehicle.~S~
Place the explosives at the ~Y~weak spots~S~ on the ship.
BOMBE1.translated: 在船上的~Y~薄弱点~S~安放炸药。

BOMBE1.original: Drive this thing to the ~Y~rendezvous point.~S~
If you damage the ~B~armored vehicle~S~ enough it will stop and you can steal it.
BOMBE1.translated: 如果你把 ~B~装甲车~S~ 破坏到一定程度它就会停下，你可以趁机偷走它。
